column4: libgcflashplayer.so is crashing in chrome anyone have a fix for that?
libgcflashplayer.so is crashing in chrome anyone have a fix for that?
don't you mean libflashplayer.so
no, I mean libgcflashplayer.so thats the name of the file as reported by chrome
i use chrome, let me see if I have the file
here are all the .so files on my system with "libgc" in them: http://pastebin.com/gL4B9V28
thanks I'll take a look at that.
if you move the file do you lose flash?
I haven't tried moving the file yet, some flash players work, others crash
can you use http://pastie.org to give the output of: dpkg -l | grep flash; dpkg -l | grep gnash; dpkg -l | grep swf     thanks
the file exists at /opt/google/chrome/libgcflashplayer.so
hmm, i'm guessing you installed with the archive rather than using a repo
can you give the output of the above command too please
I installed from http://www.google.com/chrome and yep gimme a sec I'll get that output for ya
http://pastie.org/1108933
ok then try this: sudo apt-get --purge remove flashplugin-nonfree; sudo apt-get --purge autoremove; sudo apt-get clean; sudo apt-get install flashplugin-nonfree
result of that command sha256sum mismatch install_flash_player_10_linux.tar.gz
http://klaith.wordpress.com/2009/04/04/the-flash-plugin-is-not-installed/
not that it would matter that much I don't think, Google Chrome has Flash Integrated 5.0.375.127 so it doesn't use the external plugin
not sure then. I use chromium daily and its flawless
yeah I do to, on all but this computer. /shrug, first time I've had this happen
